usefulItems: large bowl, baking dish (2 qt.), oven
title: Holiday Stuffing

ingredients.content: 8 oz yellow onions, cut into pieces
6 oz celery, cut into pieces (2 in.)
3 oz carrots, cut into pieces (1 in.)
5 fresh sage leaves, plus extra to garnish
6 oz unsalted butter, cut into pieces
22 oz chicken stock, low sodium, divided

preparations.content: Place a large bowl onto mixing bowl lid, weigh in dried bread cubes and set aside.

Place onions, celery, carrots, parsley, thyme, sage, rosemary, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>10 min/212°F//speed <b>.
Add 12 oz chicken stock and mix <b>10 sec/speed 2<b>. Transfer into bowl with reserved bread cubes.
Place 10 oz chicken stock and egg into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into bowl with bread cubes and toss to combine.

Transfer stuffing into baking dish, cover and bake for 30 minutes (375°F) until cooked through. Increase oven temperature to 450°F and bake uncovered for 10 minutes (450°F) or until golden brown. Garnish with sage leaves and serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: Serve Holiday Stuffing as a side dish or use to stuff beef tenderloin or turkey.
Add dried cranberries or pine nuts.
